title: Ontario rejects call to take over operations at long-term care homes where 54 residents have died - The Globe and Mail

content:
The Eatonville Care Centre in Toronto, is photographed on April 13 2020. Over twenty residents have died in the long term care facility.
Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail
